# Recupere les Prix : ImportAndCleanData

```{r examples-ImportAndCleanData}
urlgdoctest<-"https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1aTGGqcUAjWg8Lz5sqQ5CzCEN7LbZdKGV_PdQC4YZ6Qw/edit?usp=sharing"
urlgsheettest<-"26-janv"
# you may need to relog to avoid the "Request failed [429]. Retry " error, so use
# gs4_auth() 
DonneesTest<-ImportAndCleanData(urlgdoc = urlgdoctest, urlgsheet = urlgsheettest)

head(DonneesTest)
dput(head(DonneesTest%>%pull(id)))
```

# Sortir les prix moyens et mÃ©dians : GetPrices

```{r examples-GetPrices}
dataset<-DonneesTest
fonction<-"mean"
depmean26<-GetPrices(dataset = dataset,fonction="mean",dobydepartement = TRUE )
framedian26<-GetPrices(dataset = dataset,fonction="median",dobydepartement = FALSE )
```
